Function Documentation

SURFIT_EXPORTvoid surfit::cntr_color (  const char *  color_name  ) 
 

Parameters:
color_name name of cntr_color to set
sets color for points Available colors are : white, cyan, magenta, yellow, lblue, blue, green, red, gray, black.
